Texts.Chs: 把^orange;5枚寂灭锭^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;5 Quietus Bars^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
I'm offering 6000 pixels for a bit of aid, if you can spare a few moments? I need 5 ^orange;Quietus Bars^reset; in order to finish my work. Can you bring some to me?

Texts.Chs: 做得好。这是我的承诺：像素。好好享受吧。
Texts.Eng: Well done, ol' chap. As promised: The cash. Enjoy.
